list.title: Label3D#update
list.description: Updates the position of the label on the screen based on the camera view.

list.title: Measure#createNewMeasurePath
list.description: Creates a new measurement path and adds it to the group.

list.title: Measure#initCallBack
list.description: Initializes event callbacks for handling user interactions. Handles point selection in the scene, toggling measure mode, and clearing the current path.

list.title: Measure#leaveMeasureMode
list.description: Exits the measurement mode and updates the view accordingly.

list.title: Measure#update
list.description: Updates the UI and behavior based on the current measurement mode.

list.title: MeasurePath#addPoint
list.description: Adds a new point to the measurement path.

list.title: MeasurePath#update
list.description: Updates the 3D objects representing the measurement path, including spheres and lines.

list.title: MeasurePath#updateTransform
list.description: Updates the transform (scale) of spheres and labels based on camera distance.

list.title: TargetOrbitControlMesh#TargetOrbitControlMesh
list.description: Constructor to initialize the camera controller and related UI elements. Sets up the orbit controls, camera mesh, and initializes the UI for interaction. Adds an event listener on the orbit controls to update the mesh when changes occur.

list.title: TargetOrbitControlMesh#initUI
list.description: Initializes the UI, creating a draggable element that interacts with the 3D camera and layers. Adds drag-and-drop functionality to allow users to move the camera to a new position based on interaction.

list.title: TargetOrbitControlMesh#moveCamera
list.description: Smoothly moves the camera to a specified position and target over a defined duration.

list.title: TargetOrbitControlMesh#update
list.description:
Updates the position and scale of the mesh to reflect the current orbit target.

This function ensures that the red target mesh follows the orbit control's target position. It also adjusts the scale of the mesh based on the camera's distance to the target, making the mesh appear proportional regardless of zoom level.

list.title: Visualizer#clippingPlaneDetails
list.description: Getter for the clipping plane details.

list.title: Visualizer#domElementTargetDragElement
list.description: Getter for the DOM element used in target dragging.

list.title: Visualizer#itownsView
list.description: Getter for the itowns view instance.

list.title: Visualizer#layers
list.description: Getter for the layer manager's layers.

list.title: Visualizer#measureDomElement
list.description: Getter for the DOM element associated with the measure tool.

list.title: Visualizer#orbitControls
list.description: Getter for orbit controls.

list.title: Visualizer.CAMERA_LOCAL_STORAGE_KEY
list.description: Key for storing camera settings in local storage.

list.title: Visualizer.CLIPPING_PLANE_LOCAL_STORAGE_KEY
list.description: Key for storing clipping plane settings in local storage.

list.title: Visualizer.DEFAULT_POINT_SIZE
list.description: Default size for points in the point cloud visualization.

list.title: Visualizer.RAYCASTER_POINTS_THRESHOLD
list.description: Threshold for the raycaster points.

list.title: Visualizer.TARGET_LOCAL_STORAGE_KEY
list.description: Key for storing target information in local storage.

list.title: setUpCameraDefaults
list.description: Sets up default camera settings for an iTowns view.

list.title: setUpSpeedControls
list.description: The function setUpSpeedControls creates a set of speed controls for an OrbitControls object in a 3D scene.

list.title: setupLoadingUI
list.description: Sets up a loading UI for 3D tiles layers within a specified DOM element and iTowns view.
